course_name: Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA)
summary: The Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA) course is designed to provide participants with the necessary skills and knowledge to manage and configure Check Point security solutions. The course covers a wide range of topics, including Check Point technology overview, firewall installation in standalone and distributed environments, product design and architecture, simultaneous administration in R80, security policy management, working with inline and ordered layers, URL filtering, application control, SSL tunneling and bridging, content awareness configuration, traffic monitoring, system health and logs, legacy SmartConsole applications, network address translations, user access management with local and AD authentication, identity awareness, basic VPN concepts, and site-to-site VPN configuration. The course is hybrid, offering both on-campus sessions at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and online sessions via Zoom. It includes 6 meetings, totaling 30 academic hours, with flexible scheduling options. The course also features a virtual lab environment for hands-on practice, which is used by Check Point clients both in Israel and abroad. This is the first course in Israel to include the latest version of the product in a fully virtual environment. The course is aimed at equipping participants with one of the most in-demand certifications in the field of cybersecurity and information security.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA)

COURSE OVERVIEW: This course is designed to provide participants with the most up-to-date certification in the field of information security and cyber. It includes the latest version of the product in a fully virtual environment. The lab environment used in the course is utilized for training Check Point customers both in Israel and abroad. The course is hybrid, offering the flexibility to attend classes either on-campus at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan or via Zoom.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 22.11.2024.
- Duration: 6 sessions over 30 academic hours.
- Schedule: Mondays from 17:30 to 21:30.
- Special Sessions: 
  - 22.11.2024 (Friday) from 09:00 to 13:00.
  - 26.11.2024 (Tuesday) from 17:30 to 21:30.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Hybrid learning: Classes are conducted both on-campus at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, based on the participant's preference.
- Virtual lab environment for hands-on practice.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Check Point Technology Overview.
- Introduction to the Lab.
- Installing Firewalls in Standalone and Distributed Environments.
- Product Design and Architecture.
- Simultaneous Administration in R80.
- Security Policy Management.
- Working with Inline and Ordered Layers.
- Understanding URL Filtering and Application Control.
- Implementing SSL Tunneling and SSL Bridging.
- Configuring Content Awareness.
- Monitoring Traffic, Connections, System Health, and Logs.
- Working with Legacy SmartConsole Applications.
- Network Address Translations.
- Managing User Access with Local Authentication.
- Managing AD Authentication with Identity Awareness.
- Basic Concepts of VPN.
- Configuring Site-to-Site VPN.

CERTIFICATIONS: Check Point Certified Security Administrator (CCSA).

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an interview and register, contact: 052-5886002.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: 
- The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University. The school specializes in dedicated programs for the field of cyber and information security.
